data.message: People often find long-lost friends, recover pets or fall in love on Facebook, but we only know of one story where someone on Facebook used her connections to be released from a foreign jail. During the making of Tapestries of Hope, the filmmaker and crew were imprisoned and later freed thanks to the efforts of their fans on Facebook. Learn more about the movie, showing for one night only in theaters on Sept. 28.
data.story: Facebook shared Something To Talk About's video.
